overview:
D & P SMEs lies in the logic of entrepreneurs who wish to pool their risks and bring their expertise to other business leaders are participating in a fund to invest in midsize companies.

D & P SME aims to invest solely on achieving profitable niche SME between â‚¬ 5m and â‚¬ 50m in turnover to give them the capital needed to finance their development, promote transmission projects ( LBO) and merger (Build up).

D & P enjoys the SME network of expertise on the company shareholders.

They work with the management team as “godfathers” in analyzing the opportunities, validation plans for restructuring and redeployment, and throughout the life of participation.

D & P SME has the ability to federate rounds with other investment funds but also with company shareholders.

P & D and SMEs interested in all areas of activity by placing the management and its project at the heart of the analysis.
